patch:
diff --git a/pygments/lexers/objective.py b/pygments/lexers/objective.py
index b37a9d40..ee9d2be6 100644
--- a/pygments/lexers/objective.py
+++ b/pygments/lexers/objective.py
@@ -274,13 +274,15 @@ class LogosLexer(ObjectiveCppLexer):
     }
 
     _logos_keywords = re.compile(r'%(?:hook|ctor|init|c\()')
-
     def analyse_text(text):
-        if LogosLexer._logos_keywords.search(text):
-            return 1.0
-        return 0
-
-
+        # Logos (Theos) uses distinctive directives that begin with '%'.
+        # Only return a high confidence when those directives are present,
+        # otherwise do not match at all to avoid stealing plain C/ObjC.
+        if re.search(r'^\s*%(?:hook|subclass|group|ctor|dtor|init|config|new)\b', text, re.M):
+            return 0.95
+        if re.search(r'\B%(?:orig|log|c)\b', text):
+            return 0.8
+        return 0.0
 class SwiftLexer(RegexLexer):
     """
     For Swift source.
